message.content: {"id": "13725", "title": "Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor.", "description": "When performing the following steps in the Java editor: 1) Open an editor on the file org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder 'Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets' in the project 'org.eclipse.swt' in the open source repository. 2) Mark the file as dirty by selecting the end of the first line and entering a space character. 3) Click on the close box in the editor tab and select 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 4) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. It takes about 8 seconds to complete. However, if after steps 1 and 2, I select 'Revert' from the popup menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.", "OB": "Selecting 'Revert' from the popup menu in the Java editor takes significantly longer (15 seconds) to replace the contents of the window with the original compared to closing and reopening the file (8 seconds).", "EB": "", "SR": "1) Open the file org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder 'Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets' in the project 'org.eclipse.swt' in the open source repository. 2) Mark the file as dirty by selecting the end of the first line and entering a space character. 3) Click on the close box in the editor tab and select 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 4) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 5) Select 'Revert' from the popup menu in the editor and observe the time it takes to replace the contents of the window with the original."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13725', 'title': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.', 'description': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor. ', 'OB': 'answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop upmenu in the editor it takes15 seconds to replace the contents of the windowwith the original. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': '1) Start by opening an editor on the fileorg.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder "Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets" in the project "org.eclipse.swt" in the open source repository.2) Now, select the end of the first line, and hit a space character so thatthe file has been marked dirty.From this point, on my (fast) machine at home, it takes about 8 seconds toperform the following steps: click on the close box in the editor tab. answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop upmenu in the editor it takes15 seconds to replace the contents of the windowwith the original. '}
